title: Actor Don Cheadle On His Career's Longevity, The Key To Success
teaser: Actor Don Cheadle is known for his roles in film and television. In this encore broadcast, host Michel Martin asks Cheadle if he's hit a career peak and how he'll know when to call it quits.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
